search.query: | tstats min(_time) as firstTime ,max(_time) as lastTime where index=itsi_summary by indexed_itsi_kpi_id | lookup service_kpi_lookup.csv kpiid as indexed_itsi_kpi_id OUTPUT service_name, kpi_name | search kpi_name=* | eval days_with_kpi_data = lastTime - firstTime | eval days_with_kpi_data = round(days_with_kpi_data/60/60/24,0) | eval minimum_weeks=round(days_with_kpi_data/7,0) | eval days_since_last_seen=now()-lastTime | eval days_since_last_seen = round(days_since_last_seen/60/60/24,0) | eval "First Event"=strftime(firstTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "Last Event"=strftime(lastTime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "Generated"=strftime(now(),"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| inputlookup service_kpi_lookup.csv | search $kpi$ | dedup service_name | sort service_name | table service_name
| inputlookup service_kpi_lookup.csv | search $service$ | dedup kpi_name | sort kpi_name | table kpi_name

search $service$ AND $kpi$ | rename service_name as "Service name" kpi_name as "KPI name" days_with_kpi_data as "Days with KPI data" minimum_weeks as "Minimum weeks" days_since_last_seen as "Days since last seen" | table "Service name" "KPI name" "First Event" "Last Event" "Days with KPI data" "Minimum weeks" "Days since last seen" "Generated" | sort "Service name" "KPI name"
